source.name: Forts Project
source.description: The "Forts Project" is a collection of records kept at U.S. Army Fort stations in the 19th century, as well as records of the U.S. Signal Service, a predecessor to the National Weather Service. Also included are voluntary observers' records submitted to the Signal Service and the Smithsonian Institution during the same period. The parameters included in these records are daily and monthly temperature, pressure, winds, humidity, and  precipitation.
